meanings.definition: Not having a bouncy or springy quality.
meanings.sent1: The rock was unbouncy when I dropped it on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The old mattress felt unbouncy and uncomfortable to sleep on.
meanings.sent3: The balloon was so unbouncy that it didn't even rise off the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as unbouncy as a deflated ball, lacking any energy.
meanings.sent5: The rubber band had become unbouncy over time, losing its stretchiness.

meanings.sent1: The unbouncy trampoline couldn't propel the jumper high into the air.
meanings.sent2: The unbouncy rubber ball barely bounced off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The unbouncy slinky just lay there like a straight metal rod.
meanings.sent4: His unbouncy hair remained flat even after using a lot of gel.
meanings.sent5: The unbouncy sponge soaked up very little water due to its lack of elasticity.
